<style type="text/css">
    .content {
        background: #041E42 !important;
    }

  .shortHeader{background:#1b6bb5}

    .embeddedServiceSidebarButton {
        background-color: #041E42 !important;;
        font-size: 1.275em;
        text-decoration: none !important
    }

    .chatContent {
        background: rgba(4, 30, 66, 0.9) !important
    }

    .headerChevron {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton{padding:15px 20px;height:50px;font-size:1.175em;background-color:#1b6bb5 !important;font-family:'SofiaProRegular', Fallback, sans-serif!important}

    .embeddedServiceHelpButton .uiButton .helpButtonLabel {
        text-decoration: none !important
    }

    .shortHeader {
        background: #1b6bb5
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarHeader h2 {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        font-size: 1.275em
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarButton {
        background-color: #041E42;
        font-size: 1.275em
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeader .content {
        padding-top: 5px
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeader .message {
        margin-top: 10px;
        font-size: 0.85em
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatAvatar .avatar {
        line-height: 21px
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatAvatar.isLightningOutContext .agentIconColor0 {
        background-color: #1b6bb5
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem .isLightningOutContext .avatar {
        line-height: 20px
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem.chasitor .chatContent {
        background: rgba(27, 107, 181, 0.9) !important
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChat .messageArea {
        border: 0 !important
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarHeader button:focus .headerTextContent {
        text-decoration: none
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarHeader .headerButton:focus:after {
        border: 0 !important
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem .chatContent {
        -webkit-border-radius: 6px;
        -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 0;
        -moz-border-radius: 6px;
        -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 0;
        border-radius: 6px;
        border-bottom-right-radius: 0
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeaderOption {
        text-decoration: none !important
    }

    .chatOptions a:hover,
    .chatOptions a:focus {
        color: #fff
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeaderOption.chatOption:focus:before,
    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeaderOption.chatOption:hover:before {
        background-color: transparent;
        opacity: 1
    }

    .embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatHeaderOption.chatOption:focus:after {
        border: 0
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarDialogState #dialogTextTitle {
        color: #333333;
        border: 0
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarDialogState #dialogTextTitle {
        color: #fff;
        background-color: #041E42;
        width: 115px;
        height: 115px;
        line-height: 105px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        border: 5px solid #1b6bb5;
        -webkit-border-radius: 50%!important;
        -moz-border-radius: 50%!important;
        border-radius: 50%!important
    }

    .embeddedServiceSidebarDialogState .dialogButton {
        margin: 0 0 8px;
        padding-top: 5px
    }

    .embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton:focus {
        border: 0;
        outline: none
    }
    .plaintextContent.agent.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatPlaintextMessageDefaultUI {
    background: #041E42;
  }

.avatar.iconAvatar.agentInitial.agentIconColor0 {
    margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.uiOutputRichText {
    font-weight: 13px;
    font-size: 13px;
}
span {
    font-size: 12px; 
}

span.message {
    font-size: 12px;
} 

input#FirstName {
    font-size: 11px;
}
input#LastName {
    font-size: 12px;
}
input#Email {
    font-size: 12px;
}
input#Subject {
    font-size: 12px;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem.agent .agentName {
    text-align: left;
    margin-left: 44px;
    font-size: 8px;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem.agent .timeContent {
    text-align: left;
    font-size: 8px;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem.chasitor .timeContent {
    text-align: right;
    font-size: 8px;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatPlaintextMessageDefaultUI.chasitor.plaintextContent {
    background: #0074bd !important;
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    margin-left: auto;
}


.isLightningOutContext.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatAvatar {
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatAvatar .avatar {
    padding: 6px;
    color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 36px;
    height: 31px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-size: 100%;
    text-align: center;
}

.embeddedServiceLiveAgentStateChatItem .isLightningOutContext .avatar {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    width: 32px;
    height: 31px;
    border-radius: 50px;
    background-size: cover;
    border: none;
    float: left;
    margin: 0 14px 14px 0;
}

.avatar{background-repeat: no-repeat}

 input#Title__c {
    font-size: 13px;
}

select#Case_Detail__c {
    font-size: 12px;
}

.embeddedServiceSidebarFormField .uiInputSelect>select.select {
    background-image: none;
    font-size: 12px;
}
.embeddedServiceSidebarForm .fieldList .uiInputText:last-child input {
    margin-bottom: 0;
    font-size: 12px;
}
.embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton {
		background-color: #565656;
		font-family: "Salesforce Sans", sans-serif;
	}
	.embeddedServiceHelpButton .helpButton .uiButton:focus {
		outline: 1px solid #565656;
	}
	@font-face {
		font-family: 'Salesforce Sans';
		src: url('https://www.sfdcstatic.com/system/shared/common/assets/fonts/SalesforceSans/SalesforceSans-Regular.woff') format('woff'),
		url('https://www.sfdcstatic.com/system/shared/common/assets/fonts/SalesforceSans/SalesforceSans-Regular.ttf') format('truetype');
	}

</style>
<!-- For Chat Agent-->
</head>

  <section class="col-md-12 col-sm-12 epiclandingsection">
    <h2>Safeguarding<br />Tomorrow.</h2>
    <div class="col-md-4 sectiondescription">
      <p>Your partner in<br />disaster preparedness,<br />response and recovery.</p>
      <a href="about">More About Us</a>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="col-md-12 col-sm-12 epiclandingsection">
    <h2>Seeing<br />People<br />Made Safe<br />& Whole.</h2>
    <div class="col-md-4 sectiondescription">
      <p>Our team is there for<br />you, no matter what<br />comes your way.</p>
      <a href="services">Our Services</a>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="col-md-12 col-sm-12 epiclandingsection">

      <a href="epicshield">EPIC Shield</a>

<script type='text/javascript' src='https://service.force.com/embeddedservice/5.0/esw.min.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
	var initESW = function(gslbBaseURL) {
		embedded_svc.settings.displayHelpButton = true; //Or false
		embedded_svc.settings.language = ''; //For example, enter 'en' or 'en-US'

		//(Defaults to Chat with an Expert)
		embedded_svc.settings.defaultMinimizedText = 'Chat with us (Live)'; 
		//(Defaults to Agent Offline)
		embedded_svc.settings.disabledMinimizedText = 'Chat with us';

		//embedded_svc.settings.loadingText = ''; //(Defaults to Loading)
		//embedded_svc.settings.storageDomain = 'yourdomain.com'; //(Sets the domain for your deployment so that visitors can navigate subdomains during a chat session)

		// Settings for Chat
		//embedded_svc.settings.directToButtonRouting = function(prechatFormData) {
		// Dynamically changes the button ID based on what the visitor enters in the pre-chat form.
		// Returns a valid button ID.
		//};
		//embedded_svc.settings.prepopulatedPrechatFields = {}; //Sets the auto-population of pre-chat form fields
		//embedded_svc.settings.fallbackRouting = []; //An array of button IDs, user IDs, or userId_buttonId
		//(Defaults to Contact Us)
		embedded_svc.settings.offlineSupportMinimizedText = 'Chat with us'; 

		embedded_svc.settings.enabledFeatures = ['LiveAgent'];
		embedded_svc.settings.entryFeature = 'LiveAgent';

		embedded_svc.init(
				'https://thepowerofepic.my.salesforce.com',
				'https://epiccommunity.force.com/EpicCommunity',
				gslbBaseURL,
				'00Dd0000000iOry',
				'Chat_Team',
				{
						baseLiveAgentContentURL: 'https://c.la3-c2-phx.salesforceliveagent.com/content',
						deploymentId: '5720W0000010wEs',
						buttonId: '5730W00000158Rs',
						baseLiveAgentURL: 'https://d.la3-c2-phx.salesforceliveagent.com/chat',
						eswLiveAgentDevName: 'Chat_Team',
						isOfflineSupportEnabled: true
				}
			);
	};

	if (!window.embedded_svc) {
		var s = document.createElement('script');
		s.setAttribute('src', 'https://thepowerofepic.my.salesforce.com/embeddedservice/5.0/esw.min.js');
		s.onload = function() {
		initESW(null);
		};
	document.body.appendChild(s);
	} else {
	initESW('https://service.force.com');
	}
</script>

Tomorrow.
Your partner in
disaster preparedness,
response and recovery.

People
Made Safe
& Whole.
Our team is there for
you, no matter what
comes your way.

ahead of disaster with
a long-term plan.

Your
Property
& Your
Peace
of Mind.
We understand what
it takes to protect you
and your business.

Close &
Personal.
